entry.source: 〉 The angels are no longer here...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A powerful barrier prevents you from{F801}proceeding...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A powerful barrier prevents you from{F801}proceeding...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}It seems that the angels who erected this{F801}barrier must be defeated before it will{F801}disappear.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}It seems that the angels who erected this{F801}barrier must be defeated before it will{F801}disappear.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}Come, {F843,0}. Let us find the angels{F801}and strike them down.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}Come, {F843,0}. Let us find the angels{F801}and strike them down.{F801}

entry.target: 〉 The atmosphere changed...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The barrier disappeared.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The barrier disappeared.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A powerful barrier prevents you from{F801}proceeding...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A powerful barrier prevents you from{F801}proceeding...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}This barrier created by the angels we{F801}must eliminate... It seems more powerful{F801}than the last.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}This barrier created by the angels we{F801}must eliminate... It seems more powerful{F801}than the last.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}Come, {F843,0}. Let us find the angels{F801}and strike them down.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}Come, {F843,0}. Let us find the angels{F801}and strike them down.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A powerful barrier prevents you from{F801}proceeding...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A powerful barrier prevents you from{F801}proceeding...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,-480}An elaborate trick... The barrier will{F801}remain so long as the angels who created{F801}it live...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,-480}An elaborate trick... The barrier will{F801}remain so long as the angels who created{F801}it live...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,-480}In which case, {F843,0}, we must{F801}simply hunt and kill all the angels.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,-480}In which case, {F843,0}, we must{F801}simply hunt and kill all the angels.{F801}

entry.target: 〉 The atmosphere changed...{F801}

entry.target: 〉 The barrier disappeared.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A powerful barrier prevents you from{F801}proceeding...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A powerful barrier prevents you from{F801}proceeding...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,-480}This barrier... it is stronger than the{F801}last one we demolished.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,-480}This barrier... it is stronger than the{F801}last one we demolished.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,-480}There is nothing for it, {F843,0},{F801}than to hunt and kill all the angels{F801}who remain.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,-480}There is nothing for it, {F843,0},{F801}than to hunt and kill all the angels{F801}who remain.{F801}

entry.target: 〉 The atmosphere changed...{F801}

entry.target: 〉 The barrier disappeared.{F801}
